search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Autopilot Journeys (autopilot.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Autopilot Journeys can be found at this URL: [https://journeys.autopilotapp.com/pricing](https://journeys.autopilotapp.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

### Autopilot is marketing automation software.

Autopilot is affordable and scales as your business grows. Prices start from just $49/month for up to 2000 contacts.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing starts at $49/month for up to 2000 contacts.
